text: The Northwest Region is a region in Cameroon. The capital city is Bamenda. The Kilum-Ijim Forest, Menchum Falls, and Lake Oku are in the region. There are 7 departments: * Boyo * Bui * Donga-Mantung * Menchum * Mezam * Momo * Ngo- Ketunjia (Ngoketunjia) Category:Regions of Cameroon Category:1972 establishments in Africa Category:1970s establishments in Cameroon
title: Northwest Region (Cameroon)
